version_description:
General bug fixes and improvements

--------------------------------------
For the sneakerhead in all of us. Use the app to enter shoe raffles at participating locations near you or cop a drop the day of a launch.

Shop the latest shoes and clothes on the go or from the comfort of your couch.

Access MVP Rewards to receive exclusive offers and earn points for your purchases

General bug fixes and improvements

--------------------------------------
For the sneakerhead in all of us. Use the app to enter shoe raffles at participating locations near you or cop a drop the day of a launch.

Shop the latest shoes and clothes on the go or from the comfort of your couch.

Access MVP Rewards to receive exclusive offers and earn points for your purchases

- Zoom in and get a closer view of all our shoes, shirts, and gear
- Now you can apply your awards easily from checkout
- General bug fixes and optimizations

- You can now get directions to your store from the Raffle Win confirmation page
- Various bug fixes and improvements

Tired of waiting by the mailbox for the latest trends? Use the app to browse and pick up at your nearest store in 90 minutes.

Unsure about sizing? Reserve your items for free and try before you buy. We'll have your items waiting for you.

-General bug fixes including removal of out of stock items from your bag
-Sign up for texts from Hibbett marketing to get up to date on all the latest shoes

Sign up with your phone number to sync your rewards and easily opt into texts alerts on raffles you've entered, pick up orders you've made, and updates on our hottest new products.

We're making lots of great changes for you! You can now browse products we think you'll love and check out our trendiest kicks.
We're making lots of great changes for you! You can now browse products we think you'll love and check out our trendiest kicks.

With this update, you can now look back and see exactly what size and store you entered a raffle for.

We’ve also made it even easier to tell us what you think. You can leave us feedback directly in the app!

With this update, you can now look back and see exactly what size and store you entered a raffle for.

We’ve also made it even easier to tell us what you think. You can leave us feedback directly in the app!
In this update, we're excited to introduce our new Hibbett | City Gear app! Shop the entire Hibbett and City Gear catalog for the latest sneakers, apparel, team gear & more.
In this update, we're excited to introduce our new Hibbett | City Gear app! Shop the entire Hibbett and City Gear catalog for the latest sneakers, apparel, team gear & more.

Thanks for all the feedback since our last release! The Hibbett | City Gear app now gives you the ability to edit your raffle entry. We also went ahead and fixed some of the most commonly reported issues with your cart.

Thanks for all the feedback since our last release! The Hibbett | City Gear app now gives you the ability to edit your raffle entry. We also went ahead and fixed some of the most commonly reported issues with your cart.
Hibbett | City Gear has introduced text message verification to make our raffles as fair as possible!
Hibbett | City Gear has introduced text message verification to make our raffles as fair as possible!

Several updates for a more secure app experience
1) Improvements to our captcha to make raffles and launches fair
2) Adding privacy policy on all pages that collect personal information
3) Updating age rating and raffle rules

Several updates for a more secure app experience
1) Improvements to our captcha to make raffles and launches fair
2) Adding privacy policy on all pages that collect personal information
3) Updating age rating and raffle rules

Fixed a bug with shipping address to make sure your products get to you.

Several minor performance fixes.

Fixed a bug with shipping address to make sure your products get to you.

Several minor performance fixes.
We've updated our raffle pages so you know what to expect from each step of the raffle process
We've updated our raffle pages so you know what to expect from each step of the raffle process
Hibbett | City Gear now enables you to select someone else to pick up your raffle win if you can't make it.
Hibbett | City Gear now enables you to select someone else to pick up your raffle win if you can't make it.

Hibbett | City Gear now enables you to select someone else to pick up your raffle win if you can't make it.

We've also squashed a bug that caused crashing on the launch page.

We've also squashed a bug that caused crashing on the launch page.

This version is packed full for you. We've updated our pickup time for raffle winners, introduced curbside pickup for orders from your local store, and added products that ship directly from Nike. We've also squashed a ton of bugs.

This version is packed full for you. We've updated our pickup time for raffle winners, introduced curbside pickup for orders from your local store, and added products that ship directly from Nike. We've also squashed a ton of bugs.
With this update, we've given you the ability to save items you love for later.
With this update, we've given you the ability to save items you love for later.
In this release, we've fixed a few bugs for you.
In this release, we've fixed a few bugs for you.
Hibbett | City Gear is now giving you package insurance for no added cost and free shipping on all purchases - no minimum required!
Hibbett | City Gear is now giving you package insurance for no added cost and free shipping on all purchases - no minimum required!
We've fixed bugs to make your experience smoother.
We've fixed bugs to make your experience smoother.
This update includes improved support for notifications and crash analytics.
This update includes improved support for notifications and crash analytics.
In this release, we've made updates to support iOS14 and improved performance.
In this release, we've made updates to support iOS14 and improved performance.
In this update, we are introducing the ability to share products you love.

In this version, Hibbett | City Gear is introducing enhancements and fixes to give you an even better shopping experience this holiday season!
In this version, Hibbett | City Gear is introducing enhancements and fixes to give you an even better shopping experience this holiday season!

In this update we've made visual improvements to help make it easier to read the app, added information about how we keep raffles and launches fair, and updated the raffle timeline to be more clear regarding key dates and times.

It's a new year for Hibbett | City Gear! Check out our new logo throughout the app.

In this release, we fixed a bug with your raffle wins.

In this version, check out our new mobile payments with Klarna!
In this version, check out our new mobile payments with Klarna!

In this release, we’re rolling out style inspiration by customers like you. Check out how others styled sneakers and apparel while you shop.

We’re also introducing a new widget so you can keep up with the hottest trends right from your phone’s homepage.

In this version, Hibbett | City Gear is rolling out some changes to make the app easier to use and provide more information about products upfront.

In this version, we're making checking out faster and easier using Apple Pay.

In this version, feel inspired by outfits curated for your trendiest self. Plus shop a wider variety of products than ever before!
